amendment.description: Page 62, after line 2, insert the following new section: SEC. 609. None of the funds provided in this Act may be expended by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to issue a draft supplemental environmental impact statement (SEIS) for Diablo Canyon Nuclear Power Plant, Units 1 and 2.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Nuclear Regulatory Commission to issue a draft supplemental environmental impact statement (SEIS) for Diablo Canyon Nuclear Power Plant.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 269 (Roll no. 588).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 269 (Roll no. 588).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A061) offered by Mrs. Capps.
